mapper.select: SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE version=#{version} AND course_id=#{courseId} AND teacher_id=#{teacherId} AND term=#{term} AND student_id=#{studentId}

SELECT DISTINCT student.`department`,student.`major`,student.`student_class`,teacher.`username`,schedule.`course_id`,course.`course_name`,schedule.`version`,schedule.`term` FROM schedule LEFT JOIN student ON schedule.`student_id`=student.`student_id` LEFT JOIN course ON course.`course_id`=schedule.`course_id` LEFT JOIN teacher ON teacher.`teacher_id`=schedule.`teacher_id` WHERE student.department LIKE #{department} AND student.major like #{major} AND student.student_class LIKE #{studentClass}
mapper.delete: DELETE `schedule` FROM `schedule`,student WHERE teacher_id=#{teacherId} AND `version`=#{version} AND term=#{term} AND student.`student_class`=#{studentClass}
